thread.title: Great service, excellent location
thread.title_full: Great service, excellent location - Review of Mercure Paris Notre Dame Saint Germain des Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: katieweezavisser
title: Great service, excellent location
text:
This venue was located conveniently within walking distance of main attractions, restaurants and bus routes. They provided a really good driver that took us to Disneyland Paris and the Airport, however the cost of laundry was quite extravagant and the corridors had a bit of a mouldy smell, and were very cramped (as was the elevator). The room however was clean and relatively spacious, had a good view, and it met the requirements of our stay.
Room Tip: Get a room with a view of the city. See more room tips
